system.description:
This long ink pen, formed of silver and copper with a thin dragonshard at its core, is an invaluable tool for the scribes of House Sivis. In the hands of a gnome with the Mark of Scribing, it has the following powers.

  • The pen never runs out of ink. The gnome can change the pen ink’s color as a free action by speaking the name of the desired color in Gnome.

  • A gnome can write in half the time normally required such as when he’s using @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-edges.Item.PLVkp6ufG6Gb7FIr]{illusion} to create secured documents.

  • When creating a document secured with the illusion power of the Mark of Scribing, the pen of the scribe reduces the Power Point cost of the Permanent Modifier for the illusion power by 2.
